title: Is That a Fish?
description: A fish with a nose like a cow? Or one with spines like a porcupine? Students will be fascinated by the different-looking creatures that are all fish. Captioned and labeled photographs support the text and offer readers an up-close look at over 25 types of fish.
reviewWords: backbone, eel, fins, gills, ray, seahorse
awareness: Segment and Blend Phonemes                : Blend and segment phonemes
phonics: Consonant Digraphs : Recognize and read consonant digraphs sh and ch
grammar: Verb Endings : Recognize and use -s and -es verb endings
wordWork: Compound Words                : Identify common compound words
